name: Cao vs Barba Ruiva version ingles
name_original: Cao vs Barba Ruiva version ingles
description:
Be Cao a professional assassin in search of gold, seek and kill
Redbeard the bloodthirsty pirate who is together with his
pirates ending the red kingdom.
All of this in a 30-minute game play, be quick, efficient, kill.
